Keywords: Amazon , Justice League , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
80 YEARS OF WONDER WOMAN: Wonder Woman has [Wonder Woman Ally team ability] and may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped.
JUSTICE LEAGUE UNLIMITED: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. 6: Remove an action token from another friendly character with the Justice League keyword that's 100 points or less.
LASSO CAPTURE: Incapacitate. // When Wonder Woman hits, after resolutions you may place a hit character of the same or smaller size adjacent to her. That character has Immobile until your next turn.
